subNodes.conversationText: root
|Ian in the party|That was almost too easy.  I thought Zorn would be more powerful than that.|***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::2    |
I agree... Let's go find father.
Wait...look...Zorn's helmet was knocked off...it's amazing how much he looks like father.
Oh my...it is father...
Quick, try and revive him.
|fade to black||***ga_fade_to_black-->Float::1    Float::0    Int::0    |
Father...It's Ian and <FirstName>...we came to save you.|***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::2    ***ga_give_xp-->Int::2000    Int::1    |
Ian...<FirstName>...oh am I glad to see you.
Father, what is going on around here?
We do not have much time for me to explain.
I understand, father, but may we ask you a few questions?
Yes, I guess we have a little more time.
I don't understand, why did you attack us?
About a year ago, the witch, during her studies of the lore of the land, learned of Zorn and his banishment.
Jadissan discovered a way to communicate with Zorn through a magical basin of water.
Zorn promised her that he would teach her of the powers of this world if she would assist him in returning to this land.
Zorn's helmet was located here in this room and it was known that if you tried to wear the helmet, you would instantly die.
Zorn explained that his helmet would allow him to possess the one who wore it, but that only he or one from his blood line could wear the helmet.
As it turns out, Zorn was my father, your grandfather.
Your grandmother, Jena, was a prisoner here many years ago and was allowed to live as Zorn took a liking to her.
The witch discovered this and once she realized that I was in Charnia, she brought me here and forced me to wear the helmet.
It has been a long time since then and I have been a prisoner in my own body and mind.
I was not aware of Zorn's thoughts and he was not aware of mine.  He had complete control of my body, so I couldn't remove the helmet.
I am so glad to see you and Ian.
We are so relieved that you are alive and safe now, may we ask another question?
What do you know about Jadissan's plans?
I suspected that she was just using Zorn to gain knowledge and power.
I am sure she would have destroyed me when she no longer needed Zorn.
Zorn also had his own plans for Jadissan.  When he first possessed my body, his powers were weak.  Over time he has become stronger.
He planned on using Jadissan to help him destroy all of the Charnians and then he would kill her as well.
The witch's intentions were to unite all of the followers of Zorn by bringing Zorn back.
She planned on using this army to destroy all the Charnians on this side of the Grimstan Mountains and on the Western Lands as well.
May we ask another question, father?
We have no more questions for now.
Then you must go after Jadissan, the witch, and stop her from gathering a larger army.|***sj_a_map_point_show-->String::mp_volcano    |
Do you know where she went?
She is on her way to the Great Volcano.  I will mark the path on your map.|***ga_lock-->String::jail_door    Int::0    |
I'll go free my friends and we'll head back to Charnia.
You must try and catch the witch and disrupt her plans.  We shall meet again in Charnia's Civic Center in the center of town.
Good luck father...take care...we shall meet up soon.
Good luck and may Elos protect us...
|***ga_force_exit-->String::Zorn_nice    String::wp_adwen_exit    Int::1    |
